name: Frogwash
description:
A very early build of Frogwash.

You're a little frog guy. Get to the end, pick up optional tapes, fun times for all.

Controls are as follows:

  • Z - Run (have to unlock it first)
  • X - Jump
  • C - Grab a flipped enemy
  • Space - Chat to your fly friend. You can't leave the room til he's shut up, but you can walk around.

It's also controller friendly! I tested it with a Switch Pro controller though, so I don't know how well it's going to work on your end.

Debug stuff:

Press T to restart a room.

Press Q and W to change your colour palette - you don't even need to have it unlocked! Or you can hold Backspace to walk through em slowlike.

Press 0 to bring up the map. No marker to say where you are on it though, so good luck with that.

Press L to unlock extra abilities not normally obtainable in the demo. Walljump is self explanatory, and Tongue can be used with the V key. Climb up one way platforms and grab enemies!

That's it I think. Have fun!
